name: numpy-documentation-search
title: NumPy Documentation Search
description: Quickly search through official NumPy documentation
author: FariaF22

commands.name: numpy-docs
commands.title: NumPy Docs
commands.subtitle: Search through Numpy documentation
commands.description: Search NumPy's API reference and preview documentation inside Raycast.

preferences.name: useShortPrefix
preferences.title: Use Short Prefix
preferences.label: Display 'np.' instead of 'numpy.'
preferences.description: Show NumPy functions with 'np.' prefix (e.g., 'np.array') instead of 'numpy.' prefix (e.g., 'numpy.array')

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
